comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Typing error, the correct name is Max Breitung (see the inscription on the picture). He was indicted in 1916 in connection with German plots to destroy munition ships. See The Hays free press., February 28, 1918, Image 6

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks B-59 for catching the typo on the name.  We will fix it and add more information when we update the description.
